title:
Info please on large land clearing going on in Rocky Point on Shaw Highway. Is this possibly the future site of a Triathlete Center?  That is the rumor!

Thank you....
text:
A triathlete center is going in on land in Rocky Point and it sounds like that location is it. Here's a link to our latest story on it with a map showing the approximate location (see the far left column):



http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20150604/ARTICLES/150609853
